text: Michel Zucarelli (born 30 October 1953) is a former French cyclist. He competed in the individual and team pursuit events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of France Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Montfermeil Category:French track cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Seine-Saint-Denis
title: Michel Zucarelli
